page.title: 17HOUSING IN MARKFIELD
page.content: Mayflower Court is a block of flats for the elderly.There is a warden in the flats who is there to look after the people.She calls in on them every morning to see if they are all right.If somebody is ill in the night there is a red cord in each flat for them to pull. When it is pulled an alarm sounds and green and red lights flash in the warden's flat.The warden will go to see what the problem is. The flats have a little kitchen, a bathroom, a lounge and a little room room that is added on with no door. My nanna has lace curtains so that you cannot see into the bedroom.When you open the front door there is a big wardrobe on the right and on the left a utility room for brushes etc. The elderly people like to go to clubs.They play cards and go on trips.
